phrases: I am getting used to my new life.
I was so happy, I could not stop myself.
It seems like breakfast is ready.
Can you tell Silver that I do not need to eat today, either?
I wonder what is wrong with him.
It is been two weeks since we got back from the church, and he still has not come out of his room.
Why do not you open the door and ask?
Maybe the transformation from the fight took a toll on him.
It takes a lot of energy to change your appearance, maybe?
Why do you say that like a question?
Maybe it has not quite hit me that I am a fairy.
You have been exploring the property this whole time.
It is something I need to do.
I do not want to admit it, but yeah.
I-I do not know what just happened, but we got kicked out.
Be back before it gets dark.
It looks like she gave us some spending money.
I wonder if it is safe to go out right now, though.
Hey, long time no see, Chise!
No, I am not asking about him.
I want to know how you are doing.
I cannot buy any gifts for Silky, but I am hoping there is something she can use at home.
Now, can I take a look?
It looks like it is functioning properly.
She looks sleepy all the time.
You seem especially tired after you use magic.
Learn to depend on people, or you will screw something up...
When you are on your own someday.
You seem like a good person.
Do not try to do everything by yourself.
Otherwise, what is the point of having helpful neighbors?
You are hot-blooded, but you have a weak heart.
You have to take care of your body.
Speaking of which, what are you doing about school?
You could be going to school, at your age.
I have to take care of the flowers and herbs.
Studying magic is a lot of work.
Each season has its own special chores to do and lessons for me to learn.
I am just content being allowed to stay with Elias and the others.
Chise, are you sure you are not being overly dependent?
You have a long time ahead of you.
Do not spend your time relying on handouts from others.
I know you had a hard time elsewhere,
but you do not have to be fixed to him.
No, I have said too much.
No, thank you for caring about me.
Do not be too much of a good girl.
I am depending on someone who does not think anything of me.
I tell myself that I would not mind being abandoned, yet I do not want to be.
I used to hate coming home when the lights were on.
I share a little bit of many things with you.
If that event was a curse put upon you, I want it to be lifted soon.
I bought some giftsI mean, some snacks and such for us.
I cannot control my body very well.
It might be scary, but let me stay this way.
Will you explain things to me in the morning?
The reason I am not scared must be
I should not have given birth to you.
Ruth, it is time for breakfast.
I can move with you easier in this form.
You have a good big brother now.
I think he is rubbing off on you!
You are afraid of him being gone.
More than that, you are worried.
Why do you try to deny it?
It is important to love something other than yourself.
It is important both to protect that something, as well as for your own sake.
I love you, and I will always love Isabelle.
I wish it were that easy.
I have not seen you before.
It is remote, but it is nice here, is not it?
Feel free to come see my garden, if you are interested.
The queens will be happy, too.
Hey, you are a Sleigh Beggy.
Speak of me, and I will eat you.
She is a vampire that grants a man talent in exchange for his blood.
Meanwhile, you are just a doggy.
Are not your kind interested in younger men?
Suck that man's blood, and he will die in an instant.
Would you two like to come in for tea?
You look pale from your lack of sleep.
I will let you know if I find him.
Mess with her, and I will rip you apart, vampire.
I live alone here, so I have been longing for someone to have some tea with me.
That is an amazing book collection.
I have a short story, actually.
Could I ask you to read it?
I am not good at reading.
It might take a long time.
A simple story about two people who meet in a rose garden.
But there was something nostalgic about it.
Was not it a nice story?
Yes, but it did not seem like you were giving him the talent.
You are not taking his blood, either.
I felt like our eyes met that day, in the rose garden.
It is not like he is my type!
He is old, and a skinny slob to boot!
He does not have anything he is devoting his life to or anything, either,
so I cannot take his blood.
And I cannot give him what I otherwise could.
I do not know what to do.
Maybe, since you are a human, you understand how I feel.
I cannot believe I dozed off.
I have been really sleepy lately.
Was that story about the roses here?
I once saw someone very beautiful here, a long time ago.
It might have been a daydream, but it must have been...
I feel like our eyes met again just now.
That is not the answer I am looking for.
We love by consuming and giving.
So I do not love him.
Come give him a visit again.
It is not a word that I deserve to say when all I can think about is myself.
He is in the forests north of the house.
It is dangerous to come into the forest at dusk.
I left you a note saying I would be home by night.
You are not going to tell me anything, are you?
Why this is happening, what kind of creature you are...
You always avoid me when I ask.
You are always quick to understand.
You accepted what I said without questioning me.
No matter how selfish I am,
it is not like I am so disinterested in you that I can bear not knowing about you.
I have never seen you make such a face.
Was I making a weird face?
Yes, I have never seen you like that.
Were you looking for me the whole time?
I left you a note and everything.
You are making a scary face.
Are you asking me to just take that note and leave you, with the way things were going?
I may accept everything you say, but if you vanish on me like that...
Half of what he says is a lie.
I did not mind him trying to gloss things over before.
Why am I so scared now?
As for any other questions you may have about me, could you give me a little time?
I want time to gather my thoughts.
What are you thinking about, then?
I told you, I am not...
I have a message from Lindel-sama.
I have business with the child you foster.
The girl visits the land of dragons for a second time.
There, she learns of a side to the mage that she would never known before.
It came as certain as the night.
